alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 10:31AM CDT until April 26 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi... Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting Greene, Wayne and George Counties. For the Chickasawhay River...including Leakesville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Chickasawhay At Leakesville. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26 feet, flooding at the highway bridge begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 24.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 20 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
